title: Design lines
content:
I have used Woodtype Ornaments 1 and 2 to death and need a long thin divider line, with a little design to it. Could you recommend a font that would have design elements?   
Best, linda
author: link

comments.content: You may like the ' [Dalliance Flourishes](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052933/http:/www.emigre.com/dp/getfontpage.php?PDalF.html)', by [Frank Heine](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052933/http:/www.emigre.com/Bios.php?d=13) ( R.I.P. ) / Emigre..
